short_summary: The Department of Defense is soliciting bids for Office Furniture / Dual Monitor Arms.
description: This is a statement of work for procurement of dual monitor arms to be used by employees at Carling Campus in Ottawa. The available number of dual monitor arms is insufficient, and 435 more are needed to enable the Department of Defense to transition back to a Hybrid Return to Office (RTO) schedule. Delivery must be to a specific location and during a specific time frame. Submission requirements are outlined in guidelines.
duration_in_months: Our required contract deliverables are expected to be met within a period. We need to deliver the est of the work during the dedly stipulated period. This malfunction endeavour started on the 09/13/23
full_summary:
**Office Equipment Tender**
================================

**Tender Information:**
------------------------

* Office Furniture/Dual Monitor Arms Tender Reference: cb-9374-28632355
* Tender Title: Purchasing Office Dual Monitor Arms for Hybrid Return to Office (RTO) at Carling Campus
* Solicitation Number: 2023-MSO-003
* Amendment Number: 6
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-13T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-09
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-11-09

**Tender Description:**
------------------------

This tender involves the procurement of 435 dual monitor arms for the hybrid return to office (RTO) at the Carling Campus. The proposed solution must include the delivery and installation of dual monitor arms to meet the needs of HR-CIV employees.

* The successful bidder must deliver dual monitor arms to the Service Business Center – Building 2 (Loading Dock) at 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON.
* The bidder must then transfer the equipment to Building 3 – 1st floor – Collaborative Space, where the equipment will be installed.
* The tender requires the successful bidder to deliver all equipment by November 9th, COB.

**Selection Criteria:**
------------------------

The successful bidder will be selected based on the Lowest Cost-per-Point method.

**Contract Requirements:**
-------------------------

The contract requires the successful bidder to deliver all equipment and services outlined in the statement of work. The deliverables must meet all mandatory technical criteria and be received by November 9th, COB.

**Attachments:**
---------------

The tender includes the following attachments:

* Tender Notice: npp_adm( hr-civ-eng_2023-mso-003.pdf)
* SOL Dual Monitor Arms: sow-dual-arms.pdf
* furniture administration(rfp)rfp template-en.pdf

**Contact Information:**
-------------------------

For any questions or concerns, please contact Trina Gaumond at trina.gaumond2@forces.gc.ca or (418) 809-8827.

**Trade Agreements:**
--------------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (
